    • Method Detail

      • isFull

        public double isFull(double size)
        Checks if the pump is occupied. If unitSpaceAvailable is less then MAXQUEUE, it is available. Otherwise it is unavailable and the vehicle can't enter the queue.
        Parameters:
        size - Size of the Vehicle that is being compared against the queue
        Returns:
        Size of the queue if the Vehicle entered it. returns 0.0 if Vehicle will not fit

      • getQueueFree

        public double getQueueFree()
        Returns the number of spaces in the queue.
        Returns:
        unitSpaceAvailable

      • addToPumpQueue

        public void addToPumpQueue(Driver driver)
        Adds a driver to the pump queue
        Parameters:
        driver - The driver to be added

      • removeVehicleFromPumpQueue

        public void removeVehicleFromPumpQueue()
        A pump will have several vehicles. removeVehicleFromPumpQueue method will iterate through those vehicles. This means that when a vehicle leaves the queue, the next vehicle arrives at the pump. The next Vehicle in the queue is specified by this method. A

      • getQueue

        public int getQueue()
        Returns the pump's queue
        Returns:
        queueSize

      • getVehicleQueue

        public java.util.ArrayList<Driver> getVehicleQueue()
        Returns list of vehicles in the pumps queue
        Returns:
        Queue field, containing ArrayList of Drivers

      • getFirstDriver

        public Driver getFirstDriver()
        Returns the first driver in the pump queue (the one at the pump itself)
        Returns:
        First driver in queue

      • willVehicleFit

        public boolean willVehicleFit(double size)
        Checks if the vehicle will fit inside the queue
        Parameters:
        size - Vehicle size that will be compared against the queue
        Returns:
        Boolean which is true if vehicle can fit in pump queue, false if not
